titulo: Book 2: Learn Spanish with ROYBI Robot For Kids and Adults Beginner - Español Learning: Includes 10 Beginner Lessons and 60 New Spanish Vocabularies (Learn Spanish for Children and Adults)
descripcion:
This book is brought to you by ROYBI Robot, the world’s first smart educational robot for children. It includes beginner Spanish lessons and 60 new vocabularies. This book is the first of our Spanish learning book series for kids and adults.
ROYBI Robot is designed for children ages 3+ to teach languages with over 1,000 interactive lessons.
